ca.corefacility.gview.style.datastyle.mapper

Interface ContinuousStyleMapper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HueFeatureStyleMapper, OpacityFeatureStyleMapper

    public interface ContinuousStyleMapper

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void mapValueToStyle(float value, FeatureItem featureItem)
      Maps a particular value in the range of 0.0 to 1.0 to some style property in the passed FeatureItem.

    • Method Detail

      • mapValueToStyle

        void mapValueToStyle(float value,
                   FeatureItem featureItem)
        Maps a particular value in the range of 0.0 to 1.0 to some style property in the passed FeatureItem.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to map, in the range of 0.0 to 1.0.
        featureItem - The FeatureItem to apply the style to.
